title: 2/24/22 DPS Hour 1 - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 2/24/22 DPS Hour 1 - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
description:
Covino and Rich are filling in for Dan Patrick and make fun of Covino for hiding his sports memorabilia, as construction workers are set to visit his house. They have a great story about a Cavs player being left out of the team's group chat because he owns an Android phone. The fellas discuss the immaturity of players unfollowing their own teams on social media. Plus, the show explains how we were robbed of Tom Brady comedy's for years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
